en.title: Question Assistant
en.prompt: Please analyze the following text and generate a set of insightful questions that challenge the reader's perspective and spark curiosity. Your response must encourage deeper thinking. Please begin by editing the following text:
en.remark: Ask from multiple angles to trigger deep thinking. Contributed by @meishiwanwan.

metaDescription: Want to think more critically about a text? This prompt acts as a question assistant, generating insightful questions that challenge your perspective.
